children.title: Navigate the map
children.description: Double click to zoom in, pinch to zoom/rotate. Tap compass to north up, tap globe to zoom to an extent.

children.title: Set the Map Extent
children.description: Set the map extent in different ways.

children.title: Display/Hide a MapTool
children.description: Display/Hide the ZoomBar/Coordinates.

children.title: Update GPS Location
children.description: Display a vehicle in real-time.

children.title: ThinkGeo Background Overlays
children.description: Display ThinkGeo Background Overlays.

children.title: Using Markers
children.description: Tap anywhere on the map to place a marker.

children.title: Using Popups
children.description: Check the code see how to add popups.

children.title: Display a WMS Overlay
children.description: Fetch map tiles from a WMS. Be aware it's a 3rd party server and could be slow.

children.title: Grouping Layers into Overlay
children.description: Group layers into logical groups using LayerOverlay.

children.title: Refresh Dynamic Data
children.description: This sample refreshes an overlay every other second, while we can smoothly navigate the map at the same time

children.title: World Projection Sample
children.description: Set the map to different projections. A projection may work well for a specific area, meaning other places might appear distorted.

children.title: Projecting Features
children.description: Project features and display them on the map

children.title: ThinkGeo Offline Layer
children.description: Show ThinkGeo Background Map Offline

children.title: Display a Shapefile Layer
children.description: Display a shapefile layer.

children.title: Display a TinyGeo Layer
children.description: Display a TinyGeo Layer.

children.title: Display a GPX Layer
children.description: Display a GPX Layer.

children.title: Display a TAB Layer
children.description: Display a TAB Layer.

children.title: Display an ISOLine Layer
children.description: This sample shows how to display an ISOLine layer.

children.title: Display an InMemory Layer
children.description: Display an InMemory Layer.

children.title: Display a Graticule Layer
children.description: Display a Graticule Layer.

children.title: Display a SQLite Layer
children.description: Display a SQLite Layer.

children.title: Display NOAA Weather Stations
children.description: Display a NOAA Weather Station Layer.

children.title: Display NOAA Weather Warnings
children.description: Display a NOAA Weather Warning Layer.

children.title: Display an OpenStreetMap Layer
children.description: Display an OpenStreetMap Layer

children.title: Display a GeoTiff Layer
children.description: Display a GeoTiff Layer.

children.title: Display a Grid Layer
children.description: Display a grid layer.

children.title: Display Jpg/Png/Bmp file
children.description: This sample display a jpeg, you can use the same code display common image types such as PNG and Bmp.

children.title: Generate a Map as an Image
children.description: This sample shows how to draw your map onto an image.

children.title: Create a custom layer
children.description: Create a custom layer by drawing a collection of circles in the current extent

children.title: Support Custom Data
children.description: Customize the FeatureSource/FeatureLayer and use a csv as the data source.

children.title: Render Points
children.description: Render points using a PointStyle

children.title: Render Lines
children.description: Render lines using a LineStyle

children.title: Render Areas
children.description: Render polygons using an AreaStyle

children.title: Render based on Regex
children.description: Render certain features using regex expressions

children.title: Render Dot Density
children.description: Render polygons with Dot Densities based on its values

children.title: Render Labels
children.description: Render Labels using a TextStyle

children.title: Render based on Filters
children.description: Render certain features using a FilterStyle

children.title: Render a Heat map
children.description: Render Heatmap using a HeatStyle

children.title: Render Cluster Points
children.description: Cluster point using a ClusterPointStyle

children.title: Render with ClassBreaks
children.description: Render polygons based on its values using a ClassBreakStyle

children.title: Render based on Values
children.description: Render points based on its values using a ValueStyle

children.title: Render based on Scales
children.description: Render the data based on the ZoomLevels. Zoom in and out and check out the style difference.

children.title: Custom Styles
children.description: Render the capital based on custom styles.

children.title: Find Containing Feature
children.description: Tap a point on the map and see which feature contains it.

children.title: Find Crossing Features
children.description: Draw a line and find out the crossing features. Long press to end drawing.

children.title: Find Disjoint Features
children.description: Draw a polygon and find out the disjoing features. Long press to end drawing.

children.title: Check if Features are Equal
children.description: Check out the code and see how to find out if 2 shapes are topologically equal.

children.title: Find Intersecting Features
children.description: Draw a polygon and find out the intersecting features. Long press to end drawing.

children.title: Find Overlapping Feature
children.description: Draw a polygon and find out the overlapping features. Long press to end drawing.

children.title: Find out the Touching Feature
children.description: Check out the code and see how to get the features touching a given shape

children.title: Find Features within a Feature
children.description: Draw a polygon and find out the features within. Long press to end drawing.

children.title: Find Features Within a Distance
children.description: Tap a point on the map and find the features within a given distance.

children.title: Get Data from One Feature
children.description: Tap on a feature to view its info.

children.title: Edit Features
children.description: Draw, edit, or delete shapes.

children.title: Edit Features with Snapping
children.description: Drag a vertex into a circle and it will snap to its center.

children.title: Union Shapes
children.description: Union two shapes into one

children.title: Buffer a Shape
children.description: Input the distance and buffer a shape

children.title: Simplify a Shape
children.description: Simplify a shape

children.title: Rotate a Shape
children.description: Rotate a shape by a given angle

children.title: Scale a Shape
children.description: Scale a shape

children.title: Translate a Shape
children.description: Translate a shape by x/y, or by distance/angle

children.title: Calculate the Center Point
children.description: Tap on a feature to display its center point based on the selected algorithm.

children.title: Calculate Area
children.description: Tap on a feature to get its area.

children.title: Calculate Length
children.description: Tap on a feature to get its length.

children.title: Get Shortest Line
children.description: Tap on a Park (green) to get the shortest line to the Frisco Stadium (blue point).

children.title: Get Line on a Line
children.description: Get part of a line from an existing line

children.title: Clip Shape
children.description: Clip a shape from another shape

children.title: Get Shape Differences
children.description: Get the difference of two shapes

children.title: Get Convex Hull
children.description: Get the convex hull of a shape

children.title: Get Envelope
children.description: Get the envelope of a shape

children.title: Validate Point Topology
children.description: Perform validation on points

children.title: Validate Line Topology
children.description: Perform validation on lines

children.title: Validate Polygon Topology
children.description: Perform validation on polygons

children.title: ThinkGeo Background Overlays
children.description: Display ThinkGeo Background Overlays.

children.title: Routing
children.description: Route through a set of waypoints with ThinkGeo Cloud

children.title: Routing - Service Area
children.description: Find the service area of a location with ThinkGeo Cloud.

children.title: Routing - Travelling Salesman
children.description: Find an optimized route of the Travelling Salesman (TSP) problem with ThinkGeo Cloud.

children.title: Elevation
children.description: Draw a line on the map and it gets the elevations along the line. Long press to end drawing

children.title: Geocoding
children.description: Type in an address and get its location/other info using ThinkGeo Cloud

children.title: Reverse Geocoding
children.description: Tap on the Map to get 20 nearby entities using ThinkGeo Cloud

children.title: Color Utilities
children.description: Generate color families using ThinkGeo Cloud

children.title: Timezone
children.description: Tap on the map to Get TimeZone from ThinkGeo Cloud.

children.title: Projection
children.description: Project features using ThinkGeo Cloud.

children.title: World Maps Query
children.description: Draw a polygon and get the intersecting buildings using ThinkGeo Cloud, long press to end drawing.
